Class Selector

  • java.lang.Object
    • CardMenu
      • Selector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Updatable
    public class Selector
extends CardMenu
    A section of the menu that allows players to choose their racer model. It scales with screen size to keep everything operational.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class CardMenu

        cellIndex, cellSize, controller, offset, oldDir

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Selector​(Controller controller, Model[] models)
      Constructs a selector that responds to a controller, and lets players choose between models.

      Updates proportions to fit on screen and paints graphics.
      void reset()
      Resets this selector so that it can select a new model.

      Updates this so that it assumes a state an amount of time in the future.
